::: {.question-block}

<form onsubmit="event.preventDefault(); checkAnswer('module5_mcq_q52')" data-correct-answer="D">
<strong style="display: block;">A stock’s expected return is 12%. From CAPM, its required return is 10%. What is its alpha?</strong>

<label><input type="radio" name="module5_mcq_q52" value="A"> A. -2%</label><br>
<label><input type="radio" name="module5_mcq_q52" value="B"> B. 0%</label><br>
<label><input type="radio" name="module5_mcq_q52" value="C"> C. +1%</label><br>
<label><input type="radio" name="module5_mcq_q52" value="D"> D. +2%</label><br>
<label><input type="radio" name="module5_mcq_q52" value="E"> E. +3%</label><br>
</form>

<div id="feedback-module5_mcq_q52" class="feedback" data-status="" style="display:none;">
✅ Correct: D. Alpha = Expected return − Required return = 12% − 10% = +2%.
</div>

:::
